mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 貸出(貸出ID, 会員番号, 蔵書コード, 貸出日) VALUES (#{bookOnLoanId}, #{memberNumber.value}, #{holdingCode.value}, #{loanDate.value.value})
mapper.select: SELECT 貸出.貸出ID as "bookOnLoanId.value", 貸出.蔵書コード as "holdingCode.value", 貸出.会員番号 as "memberNumber.value", 貸出.貸出日 as "loanDate.value.value" FROM 貸出 LEFT OUTER JOIN 返却 ON 貸出.貸出ID = 返却.貸出ID WHERE 貸出.会員番号 = #{memberNumber.value} AND 返却.貸出ID IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 返却(貸出ID, 返却日) VALUES (#{bookOnLoanId.value}, #{returnDate.value.value})
